0: Under the leadership of the crooked, yet experienced Grankin, most people of Otradnoye finally felt some hope for a brighter future
9.124398: Under the protection of the Factory Gang, led by Dan, this dream came to fruition, at least partially
16.94531: Even though Otradnoye eventually grew into a large, rich city, settlers from the Wastes usually ignore it, because of the high levels of corruption, spread in the local government
